column5: Toronto set a new January 1st temperature record yesterday of 9.2 C  Crazy stuff !!
Yup, just squeeked in with it though, in 1979 it was 9.1C  Maureen

And it's not supposed to get any cooler for awhile. I posted a comment last week about Keswick being forecasted to be +12 in a week or so. I didn't post the link so there were some unbelievers.  So here is today's 14 day forecast for Keswick http://www.weather.ca/weather/14day/pages/CAON0342.htm  yes that's +12 on the 12th  Consider that this is from the foks who can't get it right 24 hours in advance. I might dispute the +12 but you can't dispute the trend
I've organized an Ice fishing bus trip for Jan 28, 47 guys. Now I'm starting to sweat  . If we do get any ice, it may be short lived.
A dozen of us are to hit Hyatt's on Callendar early February.  Not looking good if the "trends" keep up.  Damn global warming.
My prediction is Jan 20th safe ice. I'll give 2-1 odds.
2 to 1 odds. On what lake? Safe to walk on or to snowmobile to?...Details please   ps...I hope you are right
how's callander bay looking nipissing?  we're booked jan 19-21st wknd.  iffy to say the least.
Let me think about it. I'll let you know on the 19th.
This is ridiculas, I bought a bunch of ice fishing equipment last winter and barely had a chance to use it and this season looks to be worse.

O man it isnt looking good....Not only cant fish but I have to move a boathouse from one island to mine..I need at least a foot or more of good blue....As long as we dont get a lot of snow before it turns cold might be ok for February....This isnt good for all of us in this area...The outfitters, snowmobile dealers and repair centers,motels/hotels, gasoline retailers etc....will make it tough for lots of people who depend on winter.
This weather is amazing, for steelheading.. too bad for all the icefishermen
It's supposed to rain and be above 0 here till Friday.  20 deg. above normal.  Pam
